name: Wikipedia Search and Article Verification
description: Verify that users can search for topics on Wikipedia, navigate to the correct article, and confirm the article contains key sections, images, and infoboxes with a professional layout.

test_cases.name: Search for 'artificial intelligence' using Enter key
test_cases.description: Happy path: User searches for the topic 'artificial intelligence' on the Wikipedia home page and navigates to the correct article by pressing Enter.

steps.expected_result: Wikipedia home page loads and displays the central search input with the placeholder 'Search Wikipedia'.

steps.description: Type "artificial intelligence" into the search input field in the center of the page
steps.action: Type "artificial intelligence" into the search input field in the center of the page
steps.expected_result: The text "artificial intelligence" appears in the search input field.
Browser navigates to the 'Artificial intelligence â€“ Wikipedia' article page (URL contains '/wiki/Artificial_intelligence').

postconditions: User is on the 'Artificial intelligence' article page

test_cases.name: Verify presence of key article sections
test_cases.description: Ensure that the 'Artificial intelligence' article contains the expected major sections: History, Applications, Ethics, etc.
prerequisites: User is on the 'Artificial intelligence' article page (TC001 postcondition)

steps.description: Locate the table of contents on the article page
steps.action: Locate the table of contents on the article page
steps.expected_result: Table of contents is visible below the article title.

steps.description: Confirm that a section titled 'History' appears in the table of contents or as an H2 heading in the article body
steps.action: Confirm that a section titled 'History' appears in the table of contents or as an H2 heading in the article body

steps.description: Confirm that a section titled 'Applications' appears in the table of contents or as an H2 heading in the article body
steps.action: Confirm that a section titled 'Applications' appears in the table of contents or as an H2 heading in the article body

steps.description: Confirm that a section titled 'Ethics' appears in the table of contents or as an H2 heading in the article body
steps.action: Confirm that a section titled 'Ethics' appears in the table of contents or as an H2 heading in the article body

postconditions: Key sections are verified as present in the article

test_cases.name: Verify presence of images and infobox
test_cases.description: Check that the 'Artificial intelligence' article includes at least one image in the content and an infobox on the right side.
prerequisites: User is on the 'Artificial intelligence' article page

steps.description: Scroll to the top-right area of the article page
steps.action: Scroll to the top-right area of the article page
steps.expected_result: An infobox (a bordered box with summary information) is visible beside the article introduction.

steps.description: Verify that the infobox contains a title, image thumbnail, and at least one data field
steps.action: Verify that the infobox contains a title, image thumbnail, and at least one data field
steps.expected_result: Infobox displays a heading (e.g., 'Artificial intelligence'), an image thumbnail, and summary fields such as 'Parent technology' or 'Developed in'.

steps.description: Scroll down into the article content
steps.action: Scroll down into the article content
steps.expected_result: Main article content area is visible.

steps.description: Verify there is at least one image embedded within the article body
steps.action: Verify there is at least one image embedded within the article body
steps.expected_result: At least one illustrative image (with caption) is visible within the article content.

postconditions: Images and infobox are confirmed present on the article page

test_cases.name: Search for a non-existent topic
test_cases.description: Negative scenario: Verify that searching for a gibberish term shows a search results page or a 'no results' message without errors.
prerequisites: User is on the Wikipedia home page

steps.description: Type "asdfghjklqwerty" into the search input field
steps.action: Type "asdfghjklqwerty" into the search input field
steps.expected_result: The text "asdfghjklqwerty" appears in the search input field.
A search results page loads, indicating zero or a small number of results and optionally a 'The page "asdfghjklqwerty" does not exist' message.

postconditions: Search gracefully handles non-existent topics without errors

test_cases.name: Verify article professional layout and organization
test_cases.description: Validate that the 'Artificial intelligence' article is well-organized, with clear headings, consistent fonts, and a clean professional appearance.
prerequisites: User is on the 'Artificial intelligence' article page

steps.description: Observe the article title and heading hierarchy (H1, H2, H3)
steps.action: Observe the article title and heading hierarchy (H1, H2, H3)
steps.expected_result: Title uses large, bold font; section headings use decreasing font sizes in a clear hierarchy.

steps.description: Verify consistent font style and spacing between paragraphs
steps.action: Verify consistent font style and spacing between paragraphs
steps.expected_result: Paragraph text is legible, with uniform font and adequate line spacing.

steps.description: Check alignment of images, tables, and infobox against the text flow
steps.action: Check alignment of images, tables, and infobox against the text flow
steps.expected_result: All images, tables, and the infobox align properly and do not overlap or cause layout breaks.

postconditions: Article layout meets professional quality standards
